it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model

Class CurrentModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model.CurrentModifier

  • public class CurrentModifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store modifiers that may have effects on each action of the player. Modifiers are induced by excommunications and by permanent effects of development cards. It is possible to store the following kinds of modifiers:
  • Properties modifiers: modifiers that increase/reduce the amount of resources or points acquired each time the player acquires points or resources.
  • Harvest modifiers: modifiers that increase/reduce the harvest action value
  • Production modifiers: modifiers that increase/reduce the production action value
  • Dice modifiers: modifiers that increase or reduce the value of a dice
  • Dice modifier according to card color: modifiers that increase or reduce the value of a dice when used to acquire a card with a specific colour
Author:
fabri

        public ImmProperties getPropMod()
        Returns an object containing the properties modifiers. Property modifiers are modifiers that increase/reduce the amount of resources or points acquired each time the player acquires points or resources.

      • getWhiteDiceMod

        public int getWhiteDiceMod()
        Returns the value of the white dice modifier. Each time the player rolls the white dice, this modifier changes the value of the white dice.

      • getDiceMod

        public int getDiceMod(MembersColor color)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the value of the modifier of the dice whose color is specified in the 'color' parameter
        Parameters:
        color - of the dice to which the modifier is associated. It can be a value of the MembersColor enum, apart from NEUTRAL. Accepted values are: ORANGE, BLACK, WHITE.
        Returns:
        value of the modifier of the dice whose color is specified in the 'color' parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when 'color' parameter in NEUTRAL or not a member of the MembersColor enum.

      • getCardMod

        public int getCardMod(CardType type)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the value of the modifier of the cards whose color is specified in the 'color' parameter
        Parameters:
        type - of the card to which the modifier is associated. It can be a value of the CardType enum, except for EXCOMMUNICATION and LEADER. Accepted values are TERRITORY, BUILDING, CHARACTER and VENTURE.
        Returns:
        value of the modifier of the card whose type is specified in the 'type' parameter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when 'type' parameter is EXCOMMUNICATION, LEADER or not a member of the CardType enum.
